abstract: Kit Eaton AppSmart column presents his favorites apps from 2015.
lead_paragraph: A reviewer continues to use a few of the many apps that go through his hands. Here are some that stood out.

headline.main: Video Feature: Some Favorite Apps of 2015
headline.print_headline: A Roundup of Favorite, Sticky New Apps of 2015

snippet: A reviewer continues to use a few of the many apps that go through his hands. Here are some that stood out.
